Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Entity
      • model.Plant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chomper, Peashooter, Sunflower, Torchwood, Wallnut

    public abstract class Plant
extends Entity
    Abstract class that is extended by all Plants within the game

    Author:
